name: Skegness Postcard Clutch Bag
description: Bring back memories of the good old British Seaside with this lovely Postcard Clutch bag, featuring a digitally printed image on both the front and back reproduced from my childhood postcard collection. Beautifully handmade, this clutch bag has lots of room inside the stripped cotton interior for lots of your essentials, which will be kept safe and sound within the zip fastener trimmed with coordinating ribbon. And with layer upon layer of interfacing, interlining and wadding, this stunning clutch bag is made to be super strong. Perfect for adding a vintage touch to any outfit, this unique clutch bag would make a lovely gift for your friends and family or a nice little treat for yourself. Spot clean only with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements H 16 x W 24cm Made To Order

name: Little Dogs Clutch Bag
description: Perfect for special occasions or a night on the town this beautiful clutch bag will add a vintage touch to any outfit, and best of all as it’s one of a kind, you’ll be the only person in the whole world to own one just like it. Beautifully handmade from a vintage rose print satin headscarf, tweed fabric and trimmed with ric-rac there is also a detachable chain strap, so it can be used as a handbag too, making it a very versatile evening bag indeed. Fully lined in heavyweight cotton this clutch bag is made using layer upon layer of facing and interlining and is triple stitched on all stress points for extra strength. There’s plenty of room inside to accommodate lots of your essential knick-knacks, with a secure, magnetic snap fastener to keep them all safe and sound. All finished off nicely with a lovely vintage brooch. Spot clean only with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements W38 x H33 x D3cm Strap 50cm In Stock

name: Best Friends Glasses Case
description: These lovely handmade glasses cases are designed to keep your specs or sunglasses safe and scratch free. Featuring a beautiful and perhaps rather silly, vintage image of what else but a donkey with a kitten on his head, this glasses case is perfect for animal lovers and would make a unique gift for your friends and family or a special little treat for yourself. Handmade to the highest standard from lovely beige tweed and trimmed with ivory ric-rac this glasses case is lined with polka dot sage green, soft cotton. And with a layer of thick wadding on the inside for extra protection and a lovely vintage button* and loop fastening, your glasses will be kept safe and secure inside. Spot clean only with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements W 9.5 x H 17.5 Cm Made To Order *The vintage button used on your glasses case may differ from the one pictured.

description: Perfect for special occasions or a night on the town this beautiful clutch bag will add a vintage touch to any outfit, and best of all as it’s one of a kind, you’ll be the only person in the whole world to own one just like it. name: Little Dogs Shoulder Bag
description: Inspired by an old girls adventure annual this lovely shoulder bag is handmade from gold brocade fabric and features a beautiful, restored digitally printed image of a rather jolly looking girl and her two little Spaniel puppies and will make a unique addition to anyone’s wardrobe, whether treating yourself or your friends and family. Trimmed with heather ric-rac and finished with a vintage brooch*, this gorgeous shoulder bag is perfect for when you want to travel light and is still roomy enough to accommodate all of your essential knick-knacks, kept safe and sound in the fully lined interior with a magnetic snap fastener. There are also two handy little pockets on the back for extra organization and an extra-long sturdy strap that can be worn across the body. And with layer upon layer of interfacing and thick cotton wadding on the inside this little bag is as practical as it is pretty, making it perfectly suited to all manner of occasions. *The brooch you receive with your Little Dogs Shoulder Bag may differ from the one pictured. Measurements W23 x H24cm Strap 133cm MADE TO ORDER

name: Skegness Clutch Bag
description: The Skegness limited edition, clutch bag has a detachable chain strap, so it can be used as a shoulder bag too! Featuring a lovely vintage print, this beautiful handmade bag will make a wonderful, gift for your friends and family or a lovely little treat for yourself. Roomy enough to accommodate all of your essential knick-knacks, with a secure, magnetic snap fastener to keep them safe and sound, finished off beautifully with a vintage brooch, collected over the years, making each bag totally unique. Handmade from a lovely dark brown wool mix tweed fabric and trimmed with red ric-rac this clutch bag is fully lined with heavyweight unbleached cotton. And with layer upon layer of interfacing, interlining and triple stitching on all stress points to provide strength and shape, this bag is made to be as practical as it is beautiful. Spot clean only with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements W29 x H18 x D3.5cm Strap 120cm Made To Order

name: Poodle Parlour Phone Case
description: These lovely handmade phone cases are designed to add a touch of vintage charm to phones and gadgets alike. Featuring a gorgeous image of two lovely fluffy poodles; this phone case would make a unique gift for your friends and family or a special little treat for yourself. Handmade to the highest standard from a beautiful coral tweed and trimmed with gold ric-rac this phone case is lined with polka dot blue, soft cotton. And with a layer of thick wadding on the inside for extra protection and a lovely vintage button* and loop fastening, your phone will be kept safe and secure inside. Designed to fit most phones including I Phones and lots of other gadgets of a similar size. Please do check the measurements to ensure it’ll fit. Spot clean only with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements W 9 x H 13 Cm Made To Order *The vintage button used on your phone case may differ from the one pictured.

name: Happy Campers Shoulder Bag
description: Handmade from layer upon layer of fabric and interlining with triple stitching on all stress points this beautiful, big shoulder bag is as practical as it is pretty. Featuring a lovely vintage print on the front, trimmed with ric-rac and finished with a pretty brooch from my lifelong collection, this limited edition handmade bag will make a stunning addition to your wardrobe. The adjustable strap is long enough to be worn across the body or shortened to sit nicely on the shoulder. With acres of room inside the fully lined interior; there are four ric-rac trimmed pockets to keep your belongings organised, kept safe inside with two magnetic snap closures. And there’s a handy, extra roomy pocket on the back also with the added security of a magnetic snap closure. Measurements W30 x H31 x D15cm In Stock This bag will be posted Royal Mail Special Delivery and will require a signature upon receipt.

name: Messing About In Boats Coin Purse
description: Now a tad bigger in size, this dinky little coin purse features a beautiful vintage print, trimmed with ric-rac, and would make a lovely gift for friends and family or a nice little treat for yourself! Handmade from the finest fabrics, interlined with layers of bull denim, and fully lined in co-ordinating cotton this roomy little purse is tough enough to hold all your loose change and bank cards. Finished with a zip fastening, your hard earned pennies will be kept safe and sound. Spot clean with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements 13 x 12 cms Made To Order

name: God Save The Queen Shoulder Bag
description: Add a unique finishing touch to any outfit with this lovely, limited edition, God Save The Queen version of my Edna handbag. Inspired by my Auntie Edna’s favourite accessory, this beautiful handbag is handmade from recycled materials, brocade cream and gold fabric, trimmed with gold braid and finished off with a beautiful antique brooch. The sturdy, extra long strap is adjustable and is designed to be worn over the shoulder or across the body. Inside there’s masses of space to accommodate all of your essential knick-knacks, kept safe and sound with a magnetic snap fastener. Fully lined in heavyweight cotton this bag is beautifully made using layer upon layer of facing and interlining and with triple stitching on all stress points, she’s as tough as old boots. Please note as I use vintage brooches from my lifelong collection of costume jewellery, the one you receive with your God Save The Queen Limited Edition Handbag may differ from the one pictured. Measurements W32 x H23 x D 10cm Strap 66cm adjustable to 115cm MADE TO ORDER

name: Little Rascals Postcard Purse
description: Celebrate the good old British Seaside with this lovely handmade purse featuring a digitally printed image of a vintage Morecambe postcard, on the front and back, reproduced from my childhood postcard collection. Fully lined with a coordinating fabric and interlined with heavyweight cotton, this very sturdy purse has many uses; there’s plenty of room for all your pennies and bank cards, with a zip fastening to keep everything safe and sound and it could also be used as a lovely little make up bag, pencil case or just a handy little storage pouch for bits and bobs, whatever takes your fancy! Spot clean only with a damp cloth and a mild detergent. Measurements H 12 x W18cm Made To Order
